sections.text:
79-727.Rules and regulations; State Department of Education; duties.

The State Board of Education shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the provisions of sections 79-724 to 79-726. The State Department of Education shall ensure that all requirements of such sections and such rules and regulations are carried out by each school district.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 900, ยง 401;Laws 2019, LB399, ยง 2.
